member.name: D2D1_PIXEL_OPTIONS

member.name: D2D1_PIXEL_OPTIONS.D2D1_PIXEL_OPTIONS_NONE

member.name: D2D1_PIXEL_OPTIONS.D2D1_PIXEL_OPTIONS_TRIVIAL_SAMPLING
member.summary: The pixel shader samples inputs only at the same scene coordinate as the output pixel and returns transparent black whenever the input pixels are also transparent black.
